name: Meteor Storm (sprngr)
description:
You are the world's last hope - defend the planet from its inevitable destruction from an incoming meteor storm. Survive as long as you can.

Controls:

Tilt the cannon with the LEFT & RIGHT ARROW KEYS, A & D, or on screen buttons.

Fire the cannon with the UP, W, or on screen button.

Start/Restart the game with Space, Enter, or clicking the button.

Fullscreen the embedded player for best results.

May work on mobile.
